rounds.comments: (Alex: Greensboro, North Carolina actual write-in vote-getters. You're gonna love 'em.)

A prolific fighter & builder, he ruled Egypt from about 1290 to 1223 B.C.

A Swedish boxer

"Once upon a midnight dreary while I pondered ____ and ____"

"____, ____ everywhere and all the
boards did shrink"

"O, my luve's like a

"The woods are lovely, ___ and ___ / But I have promises to keep and miles to go before I sleep"
The finger of this man (d. 1642) was snipped off as his remains were moved & is now at Museo di Storia della Scienzia
This "Mont Blanc" poet was exhumed due to a Tuscan act that required all bodies that washed ashore be burned

In a movie this type of shot lets the audience know where the ensuing action is taking place

Some species of thrips are the only known animals that can reproduce by both bearing live young & doing this
Just like chickens, insects have this 4-letter pouch where food is stored & partially digested
A long-horned grasshopper gets this name from the love call produced by rubbing its two front wings together

rounds.text: She said, "I told my plans to no one.  I was not killing a man, but a wild beast that was devouring the French people"
